{"city": "Pleasant Hill", "state": "CA", "name": "Community Produce Program", "address": "816 Grayson Rd,", "phone": "925-689-8260", "notes": "Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Get Food Pleasant Hill Printer Friendly List Community Produce Program Families and individuals can pick up to 20 pounds of FREE fresh produce twice a month. Please choose ONE location. Hillcrest Congregational Church , 404 Gregory Ln, Pleasant Hill , 2nd & 4th Friday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Entrance to driveway is only accessible via Gregory Lane, and NOT the side street (Kahrs). Partner Food Pantry Pantries provide FREE food to the public. Please note: Each pantry has its own guidelines. Check with them about specific eligibility requirements and pick-up limits. Hillcrest Congregational Church , 404 Gregory Ln, Pleasant Hill , Monday, Wednesday & Friday 9:00-11:45am.
							Bring ID per each family member. Clients eligible to pick up monthly. Phone: 925-689-8260 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Hillcrest Congregational Church , 404 Gregory Ln, Pleasant Hill , Tuesday & Thursday 10:00-11:00am
Saturday 10:00am-12:00pm.
							Distribution is managed/hosted by Christ The King SVdP at Hillcrest Congregational Church. Phone: 925-246-1131 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Pleasant Hill Seventh-day Adventist , 816 Grayson Rd, Pleasant Hill , Tuesday & Thursday 11:00am-4:00pm. Phone: 925-939-2235 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Senior Food Program FREE groceries twice a month to individuals aged 55 or older who meet income guidelines. Only one senior per household can receive food. Bring a picture ID and proof of address (PG&E bill, for example). Pleasant Hill Senior Center , 233 Gregory Lane, Pleasant Hill , 1st & 3rd Thursday 9:00-10:00am. Printer Friendly List Locations Concord: 925-676-7543 4010 Nelson Ave
Concord, CA 94520 Fairfield: 707-421-9777 2370 N Watney Way
Fairfield, CA 94533 GET HELP Find Food CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Contact Us 855-309-FOOD (3663) info@foodbankccs.org How to Help Ways to Give Donate Food Volunteer Advocate Become a Partner Agency Food Bank Updates Blog Events Newsroom Newsletter Sign-up Careers Facebook Twitter Youtube Instagram Linkedin 501(c)(3) Organization | Federal Tax ID# 94-2418054 Copyright © 2025 Cookie Settings This institution is an equal opportunity provider | Site Map | Privacy Policy Website Design and Development by MIGHTYminnow", "latitude": 37.946708587905, "longitude": -122.089724746575, "source": "food_bank_of_contra_costa_and_solano_ca", "food_bank": "Food Bank of Contra Costa and Solano"}
